channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 1st May
item.description:

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 1st May
item.description:
IN HOUSE ARB TEAM:MIKE: Cut back the overhanging branches covering the light column number 95 by 0.5M wide and 5M high to allow for a street sign to be fitted to the column.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Crossing has no power., 1st May
item.description:
Crossing on wymans lane used by lots of Swindon village primary school pupils is not working. No sign of power at the crossing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 31, Wymans Lane, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several damaged areas that have recently been poorly repaired, 1st May
item.description:
Very badly damaged tarmac. A small part has recently been poorly repaired but still lots of damage ignored. Serious trip hazard especially how close to a school it is

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmleaze, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Crossing audible sound too loud/soft problem, 1st May
item.description:

item.title: Street gullies have not been cleaned for a considerable period and due to a high number of trees in this area this becomes a problem when it rains and blocks the drains, 1st May
item.description:
The problem is specifically for Park Place, extending from the Park up to the traffic light junction with the A40

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 50, Park Place, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
